proposed.name: API Testing Tool (Postman Alternative)
proposed.description: Offline-first, Git-native API testing tool for developers frustrated with Postman's pricing and limitations
proposed.notes: VERY STRONG demand signals. Build estimate: 3-5 days. Path to $400/month: 50 Pro users @ $8/month OR 14 licenses/month @ $29. Proposal: proposals/api-testing-tool-proposal.pdf
